{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Shiny Charm |image = [[File:Bag_Shiny_Charm_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Shiny Charm''. |dex = 70 |effect = Encounter shinies more often }} The '''Shiny Charm''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the probability of encountering a shiny Pokémon (this includes in the wild, in dungeons, in gyms, hatching eggs, etc.). The Shiny Charm is unlocked after catching 70 unique Pokémon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !!
